org.dancres.blitz.jini.lockmgr

Interface Locker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerImpl

    public interface Locker
extends Remote
    A non-blocking low-level lock interface. Results are immediate. Blocking semantics should be implemented higher up.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void newResource(String aClass, Comparable aKey, Serializable aResource, Uuid aClientId)
      Establish a permanent resource in this locker.
      void ping()
      Used by transaction participant implementation to check liveness.
      boolean releaseLock(String aClass, Comparable aKey, Transaction aTxn, Uuid aClientId) 
      void removeResource(String aClass, Comparable anId, Uuid aClientId)
      Delete a resource previously established via newResource.
      LockStatus takeLock(String aClass, Comparable aKey, Transaction aTxn, Uuid aClientId)
      Lock an identified lock.

    • Method Detail

      • newResource

        void newResource(String aClass,
               Comparable aKey,
               Serializable aResource,
               Uuid aClientId)
                 throws RemoteException
        Establish a permanent resource in this locker. This resource will never be thrown away unless explicitly deleted.
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • removeResource

        void removeResource(String aClass,
                  Comparable anId,
                  Uuid aClientId)
                    throws RemoteException

        Delete a resource previously established via newResource. If there is a holder of the lock, it will find that it's lease becomes invalid at the next renewal request. When this happens, it should abort as necessary.

        In most situations, rather than rely on detection via invalid lease request, a client should be explicitly informed of the impending deletion of this lock and allowed to shutdown cleanly first.

        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • takeLock

        LockStatus takeLock(String aClass,
                  Comparable aKey,
                  Transaction aTxn,
                  Uuid aClientId)
                    throws RemoteException
        Lock an identified lock. This method will create a lock if one doesn't exist already. Thus, in the case of a lock previously created via newLock this method will simply attempt to assert a lock.
        Returns:
        -1 if the lock fails, otherwise the duration of the lease
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • releaseLock

        boolean releaseLock(String aClass,
                  Comparable aKey,
                  Transaction aTxn,
                  Uuid aClientId)
                    throws RemoteException
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • ping

        void ping()
          throws RemoteException
        Used by transaction participant implementation to check liveness. Just allows us to be a bit more friendly.
        Throws:
        RemoteException
